channel.title: The PrestaShop architecture on PrestaShop Developer Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in The PrestaShop architecture on PrestaShop Developer Documentation

item.title: Introduction to PrestaShop's Architecture
item.description: Learn how PrestaShop is structured: back-end, front-end, business stack, themes and modules

item.title: Cache
item.description: The folder /var/cache/<ENV> contains all the cached files used by Symfony to improve performance. It also includes the PrestaShop class index and the Smarty cache.
